entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 3 except plus 3 over southern sections.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Rain over southern sections late in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3 except plus 3 over southern sections. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
